name: Death Realm
description:
The Story
Death Realm is a brand new action - adventure RPG brought to you by PEPOLA . Death Realm has a Gothic Dark Fantasy, dungeon crawling universe. Where you face tough and fearsome foes throughout your journey. Get ready to experience a Journey of Despair; of a Knight, who once was known as a force to be reckoned with, now reclaiming his power who will face the strongest elite demons from the Abyss and The Underworld who were born to destroy; The King of Flames, The Gatekeepers and Dragons of the underworld and many more!

Death Realm is a game which highly focuses on player's skills. You shall visualize and execute, Learn from your mistakes and remember that everything in this world is trying to kill you.


Key Features
- Extreme Difficulty: Death Realm is challenging and unforgiving but its always going to be a fair fight. Follow the enemies' way of fighting and strategize to sabotage.

- Progression: You will be offered multiple paths to progress, it will be choice - based which means the game's consequences depends on the choices you make and the routes you take.

- Combat: Players will be able to choose between a variety of weapons ranging from swords, daggers, maces to powerful elemental magic.
